CustomField.description: Use this option to change the prev button style. Use standard CSS style. e.g. background-color: #445566;border-radius:20px;border: 3px solid #ff0000.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Prev Button Style allows you to customize the visual appearance of the previous button in the survey responder interface using custom CSS styles. e.g. background-color: #445566;border-radius:20px;border: 3px solid #ff0000.
CustomField.label: Prev Button Style
